languages.text: "Сей долг я принимаю со смирением. Семена скверны Последнего восхода будут истреблены, а ксеносы — изгнаны из наших систем. Династия Чорда убережет Простор Коронус, не взирая на границы владений и власть предержащих".

traits.locale_text: "Сей долг я принимаю со смирением. Семена скверны Последнего восхода будут истреблены, а ксеносы — изгнаны из наших систем. Династия Чорда убережет Простор Коронус, не взирая на границы владений и власть предержащих".

languages.text: "I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of other domains or the powers that be."
languages.original_text: "Сей долг я принимаю со смирением. Семена скверны Последнего восхода будут истреблены, а ксеносы — изгнаны из наших систем. Династия Чорда убережет Простор Коронус, не взирая на границы владений и власть предержащих".

traits.locale_text: "I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of domains or by any powers that be."

"I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of domains or by any powers that be."

"I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of other domains or the powers that be."

languages.text: «Acepto humildemente este deber. Destruiré las semillas de la corrupción del Amanecer Final y expulsaré a los xenos de nuestros sistemas. La casa Chorda protegerá la Extensión de Koronus sin dejarse constreñir por fronteras ni autoridades ajenas».
languages.original_text: "I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of other domains or the powers that be."

traits.locale_text: «Acepto humildemente este deber. Destruiré las semillas de la corrupción del Amanecer Final y expulsaré a los xenos de nuestros sistemas. La casa Chorda protegerá la Extensión de Koronus sin dejarse constreñir por fronteras ni autoridades ajenas».

languages.text: “我愿谦卑地接下这个职责。我会摧毁终末黎明的腐化之种，清除我们星系中的异形。库尔达家族将会保护科罗努斯扩区，驱逐一切外来势力与邪恶力量。”
languages.original_text: "I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of other domains or the powers that be."

traits.locale_text: “我愿谦卑地接下这个职责。我会摧毁终末黎明的腐化之种，清除我们星系中的异形。库尔达家族将会保护科罗努斯扩区，驱逐一切外来势力与邪恶力量。”

languages.text: « J'accepte humblement cette responsabilité. Les germes de la corruption de l'Aube finale seront détruits et les xénos, bannis de nos systèmes. La maison Chorda protégera les Étendues de Koronus, sans se laisser entraver par les frontières d'autres domaines ou les autorités supérieures. »
languages.original_text: "I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of other domains or the powers that be."

traits.locale_text: « J'accepte humblement cette responsabilité. Les germes de la corruption de l'Aube finale seront détruits et les xénos, bannis de nos systèmes. La maison Chorda protégera les Étendues de Koronus, sans se laisser entraver par les frontières d'autres domaines ou les autorités supérieures. »

languages.text: 「私はこの任務を慎ましく受け入れよう。サウ語の夜明けの腐敗の種は破壊され、ゼノは我々の星系から追放されるだろう。チョーダ家はコロヌス・エクスパンスを守り、他領域や権力者の境界線にも屈することはない」
languages.original_text: "I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of other domains or the powers that be."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの任務を慎ましく受け入れよう。サウ語の夜明けの腐敗の種は破壊され、ゼノは我々の星系から追放されるだろう。チョーダ家はコロヌス・エクスパンスを守り、他領域や権力者の境界線にも屈することはない」

languages.text: "Ich akzeptiere diese Pflicht mit großer Demut. Die Saat der Korruption der Letzten Dämmerung wird zerstört werden, und die Xenos werden aus unseren Systemen verbannt werden. Das Haus Chorda wird die Koronus-Ausdehnung beschützen und sich nicht von den Grenzen anderer Reiche oder von anderen Mächten beirren lassen."
languages.original_text: "I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of other domains or the powers that be."

traits.locale_text: "Ich akzeptiere diese Pflicht mit großer Demut. Die Saat der Korruption der Letzten Dämmerung wird zerstört werden, und die Xenos werden aus unseren Systemen verbannt werden. Das Haus Chorda wird die Koronus-Ausdehnung beschützen und sich nicht von den Grenzen anderer Reiche oder von anderen Mächten beirren lassen."

languages.text: "Bu görevi tevazuyla kabul ederim. Nihai Şafak'ın ektiği yozlaşma tohumları yok edilecek ve zenolar sistemlerimizden temizlenecek. Chorda Hanesi, diğer diyarların sınırları veya kuvvetlerine aldırmadan Koronus Enginliği'ni koruyacak."
languages.original_text: "I accept this duty with humility. The seeds of the Final Dawn's corruption will be destroyed, and the xenos banished from our systems. House Chorda will protect the Koronus Expanse, undeterred by the boundaries of other domains or the powers that be."

traits.locale_text: "Bu görevi tevazuyla kabul ederim. Nihai Şafak'ın ektiği yozlaşma tohumları yok edilecek ve zenolar sistemlerimizden temizlenecek. Chorda Hanesi, diğer diyarların sınırları veya kuvvetlerine aldırmadan Koronus Enginliği'ni koruyacak."
